alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 29 at 4:42PM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 528 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN BLACKFORD DE KALB GRANT HUNTINGTON JAY LAGRANGE MIAMI NOBLE STEUBEN WABASH WELLS WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN BRANCH HILLSDALE IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, AUBURN, BERNE, BLUFFTON, BLUFFTON, BRONSON, BRYAN, COLDWATER, COLUMBIA CITY, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, DECATUR, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, DUNKIRK, EDGERTON, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GAS CITY, GRISSOM AFD, HARTFORD CITY, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, HUNTINGTON, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, LAGRANGE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIGONIER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MARION, MEXICO, MONTPELIER, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NEW HAVEN, NORTH MANCHESTER, OHIO CITY, OSSIAN, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAYNE, PERU, PORTLAND, ROANOKE, SHERWOOD, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH WHITLEY, SPENCERVILLE, SWANTON, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, UPLAND, VAN WERT, WABASH, AND WAUSEON.
